addrIsContract.title: Is the address a contract
addrIsContract.description: Check whether there's a contract in the given address.

ERC165Check.title: Is the contract ERC-165 ready
ERC165Check.description: A standard method to detect what interfaces a smart contract implements.

ERC721Check.title: Is the contract ERC-721 ready
ERC721Check.description: Most wildly used standard interface for NFTs (non-fungible tokens).

ERC1155Check.title: Is the contract ERC-1155 ready
ERC1155Check.description: A standard interface for contracts that manage multiple token types.

ERC721MetadataCheck.title: Is it ERC721Metadata ready
ERC721MetadataCheck.description: A standard interface by OpenZeppelin for providing metadata of an NFT.

ERC721EnumerableCheck.title: Is it ERC721Enumerable ready
ERC721EnumerableCheck.description: A standard interface by OpenZeppelin for loading NFTs from an address.

ERC721NameCheck.title: Does it have a name
ERC721NameCheck.description: An NFT should have a token name.

ERC721SymbolCheck.title: Does it have a symbol
ERC721SymbolCheck.description: An NFT should have a token symbol.

ERC721TotalSupplyCheck.title: Does it have a total supply
ERC721TotalSupplyCheck.description: The NFT should provide a valid number of the total supply.

ERC721TokenByIndexCheck.title: Is tokenByIndex() supported
ERC721TokenByIndexCheck.description: This methods is used to enumerate all the NFTs.

ERC721TokenOfOwnerByIndexCheck.title: Is tokenOfOwnerByIndex() supported
ERC721TokenOfOwnerByIndexCheck.description: This methods is used to enumerate the NFTs from an address.

ERC721TokenURICheck.title: Does it have a valid URI
ERC721TokenURICheck.description: Each ERC721 NFT should have a token URI for providing the metadata.

ERC1155TokenURICheck.title: Does it have a valid URI
ERC1155TokenURICheck.description: Each ERC1155 NFT should have a token URI for providing the metadata.

tokenMetadataCheck.title: Does metadata URL readable
tokenMetadataCheck.description: The metadata URL should contain a JSON file that describes the NFT.
